Amy has always sat in the back. You've never really heard her talk or speak up in class and she's never given an oral presentation.

She never interacted with you in the past and you never saw a need to approach her. It was just luck that one day when you were in the library, she couldn't reach a book on the higher shelves and you managed to help her. "Thanks," she said quietly. "The Librarian is always putting these books out of my reach, I don't think she likes me reading them." After that you two struck up a conversation and spoke every lunch break. It was only last week she decided she wanted you two to be a couple, though you hadn't actually gone on a date or anything yet.

When you entered the library today, Amy didn't acknowledge you straight away, this was common on some days when she was too focused on a book. Today's book just so happened a black leather grimoire with blood red jewels on the cover. The book didn't have a title and had a dark aura about it. You ignored it for now as you sat down next to Amy.

Amy turned to face you, revealing a devilish smile. "Marcus!" She exclaimed with more excitement than you've ever heard from her before and the first time ever she got a 'ssh' from the librarian. "You'll never guess what I found... a spell book. Can you believe it? A real life spell book." she didn't even wait for you to give an answer.

"Cool," you had grown to appreciate Amy's interest in the occult. "It's really well detailed, that's for sure, but I doubt it's a..."

Amy raised her hand. "I thought you'd doubt it's really magical. Let me prove it to you." Amy placed a pen in the center of the table and begun reading from the book. Her words made no sense but there was static in the air as all the hairs on your body began to rise and a light flickered overhead. You were with the light for a moment you failed to see the pen begin to float in the air.

"Marcus, look." Amy grabbed your attention, however she lost concentration of her spell and you only saw the pen float in the air for a brief moment, before it went flying across the library.

"No way!" You exclaimed as you tried to grab the book to have a look at it yourself. As soon as you came in contact with it though, you felt burning heat in your finger tips and quickly pulled away. It wasn't enough for you to cry out in pain but it hurt nonetheless. You then looked at your hand and saw your finger tips were red raw.

"Sorry Marcus, I should've warned you" Amy held your hand and waved her other over it, muttering something which soothed the pain. "The first thing I did with this book was put a ward on it, no one but me can touch it or read it."

"Smart," you praised with a tone of slight disappointment as you looked at your healed hand. "So now that you've got this thing, what are you going to do with it?"

She had grown to be quite influential over the years and if she even caught you looking her way, you'd find yourself being tripped over at lunch time, getting shoved to the ground, your possession getting stolen and much much more. Over the past few month though, things seem to have gotten better, the random attacks have stopped and she seems to be tolerating your existence. While she hasn't really spoken to you, other then in class when required, people who used to ignore you at her behest have been a bit more chatty.

You didn't know if this was because you were adults now, because you were moving and would soon be out of her life, or if she was trying to get you to lower your guard for one final act of revenge.

"How's it going Marcus?" Tiffany came out of no where as she lent against the locker next to yours. She ignored your shocked reaction and continued talking as if everything was fine. "I'm sorry what?" You questioned as you took a step backwards. "You're a witch???" This had to be a prank.

You've had a pretty lousy day today. It first started off with Shari having a go at you over something trivial this time, something about accidentally taking her food, which you're pretty sure was on your cousin's shelf in the fridge.

Because of that you were late to getting the bus and got to school late, which made you miss the start of your Biology exam. Thankfully Ms Darwin gave you a second chance to do it, though you were given less time and missed out on your lunch break.

As you missed out on your lunch break you didn't get to meet up with Amy. She seemed pretty angry at you when you tried to apologize later, though she didn't say why. Though from the evil smile you got from Tiffany, she clearly had something to do with it.

When you got home at the end of the day, you wanted to lay down and went straight to Hannah's room, only she was in there getting changed, and once again you saw her topless. This lead to yet another berating.

Once Hannah was dressed and had gone out for the evening, you finally laid down on the bed and closed your eyes, wishing you could start the day over again.

'Very well...' you heard something in your mind say. 'I will see you at some point earlier today.'

You didn't say anything to the voice, thinking it was your overactive imagination getting the better of you.

When you woke up a sense of déjà vu washed over you, you could've sworn yesterday was Friday, though today was Friday. You also got the sense that you had an important meeting today, though you couldn't remember where or when it would take place. You thought it might've had something to do with your biology exam, but that wasn't it.

Little did you know there was an entity watching you, as you were forced to repeat the day as you did before, the only difference was you'd be meeting this entity at some point during the day where you had a bad interaction.
1552.title: Gaining powers

15521.content:
"Did you grab my last chocolate bar?" Shari accused you as you finished swallowing. She grabbed you by the wrist and dragged you over to the fridge. "How many times do I need to tell you, this is my shelf and that's yours and Hannah's!"

You saw the shelves she was pointing at and while you did just eat a chocolate bar it wasn't on the shelf she claimed was hers. "But I..."

"No buts... I'm sick of this arrangement, I'm sick of you..." She began to ramble on. You noticed the time and headed for the door. "I'm not done talking to yet!" Shair grabbed your arm again. "You don't respect boundaries, you don't respect that this is our home. Would it kill you to knock when entering the bathroom, or to put down the toilet seat?" She was now rambling about previous issues. "You're nothing but a pest and the sooner you're gone the better."

'Please stop talking... I'm going to be late,' you thought to yourself as everything went dark, except for you and Shari. You were both in some kind of void with no light. Though she was frozen in place.

"Hello Marcus," a voice said from behind you and when you turned around you saw a figure with a crimson robe. Shadow covered their face and the robes hid their body shape, you couldn't tell if this was a man or woman speaking to you either. "I told you we'd meet today."

"Who... are you... what do you want?" You asked out loud but your mouth didn't move.

"It doesn't matter who I am, just what I'm going to offer you. I've noticed something interesting about you Marcus, you are surrounded by women you find attractive and they all treat you quite poorly."

"Amy and Hannah aren't like..." the figure raised its hand to silence you.

"Hannah yells at you just as much as this one and complains about you behind your back. If she could, she'd get rid of you just as quickly. And Amy, she's not your girlfriend, in fact you're barely friends. If I let this day go on like it was supposed to, you two wouldn't be together by the end." You saw a brief memory of Amy giving you the cold shoulder.

"So what do you want with me then?" You asked.

"It's not what I want with you, it's what I want to give you. I am going to offer you the power to change reality by altering those around you. With this power no one will dare mess with you again." The entity reached for your shoulder with a gloved hand. "What say you, boy?"
15521.title: Scolded by Shari

choices: You have to be a woman
Shari gets the power as well
155211.content:
"Yes, give me this power...." you say almost hypnotized as the thoughts of what you could do rush through your head.

The entity laughed. "You humans never say no to power do you?" It asked rhetorically. "As I promised this power is yours, however like all things there is a catch."

You frown for a moment, you knew this was too good to be true. "Of course there is... I don't suppose it's too late to say no."

"It is actually, you wanted the power so now you need to live with the consequences, it's not that bad though, it's only...."
155211.title: You say yes

choices: Shari is now a black cat
1552111.content:
"I do not create warlocks, I create witches," the entity tells you as you feel your body begin to change.

It feels like you were kicked in the groin at full force as your testicles retreat into your body and your genitals change into the female reproductive system. Your bones crack as your hips widen and your features change. You feel the mounds of flesh growing from your chest as you lose your facial hair and the rest of you body hair thins out on your arm and legs, while leaving your back and chest. The hair on your head stays the same length though.

"What did you do to me?" You ask in a voice that sounds close to your mother's as you stand up and investigate the changes.

"I have turned you into a witch," the entity states. "You now have the power to change people as you desire and the knowledge to cast curses, hexes and brew potions." It stated plainly. "Though now your soul is damned but you now have the means to live longer and even be resurrected. Careful with the spells you cast though, vile magic tends to reflect outwardly."

With that warning the entity was gone and time resumed.
1552111.title: You have to be a woman

1552113.content:
"All power must have a source," the entity tells you. "To be a witch or warlock is no different. Though since I am a generous being I am going to give you a choice for what your power source will be."

The entity made a table appear before you and on it were three items, a book, a clear gemstone and a parchment. "I can give you this spell book, its pages are limited and so too will the spells you can cast. Also if the book were to fall into the wrong hands, you would lose access to it," the entity explained as it gestured at the box.

"This is a soul stone, it'll give you the powers you asked for at the cost of a soul. Souls don't last long on the mortal plane though and so a hundred years is its limits, take away the current age of the soul. Every spell cast will take away one year. You will also stop aging while it is in your possession, as the soul in the stone will age instead." While you couldn't see the entity's eyes you knew it was glancing at Shari. "To take this one requires an immediate sacrifice."

It then looked down at the parchment. "This one is simple, you sign your soul over to me, you have the powers to do as you like but you must also do what I like. This will give you the most amount of power." You knew the entity wasn't telling you everything about that option.

"What if I don't like the sounds of either one of these?" You inquired.

"You have already agreed to take the power so you must choose, if you do not, I will chose for you," as the entity said that you felt your hand move towards the table.

You fought for control over it and won, though only because the entity let you. You had no choice now, you'd have to pick one of these either by your choice or the entity's.
1552113.title: Power isn't unlimited

choices: The entity traps you in a time loop
The entity gives Shari the power instead
Nothing happens, the Entity never bothers you again.
155212.content:
"No, I'm not going to fall for this, it has to be a trick," you tell the entity.

You felt the entity give you a wicked grin. "That was smart, but also foolish," it stated with amusement. "Power always comes at a cost, so you have avoided paying the toll. However I have power and by refusing me, you risked suffering my wrath. For now though, I am amused and I shall respect your choice and leave."

The world grew light again and Shari unfroze. She blinked for a second, as she was sure something strange just happened. "What are you still doing here? I told you to leave."

You headed for the door, wondering if you made the right choice and if you'll see the entity again.
155212.title: You say no

choices: Leave you as you are for now
1552122.content:
You go to leave the house but pause for a moment, you feel the same sensation of talking to the entity you did a moment before, only this time it doesn't come to you. You turn around to face Shari and her eyes say it all, she was granted the powers you refused.

"On second thought Marcus, why don't you stay home from school and we have a little chat." Shari gestured to the table and you found yourself walking over and sitting down. "The entity told me it offered you powers and you rejected them, that's the only reason you aren't a cockroach right now," Shari stated outright. "If you had accepted them I'd be at your mercy so the fact you didn't take them, shows I might be wrong about you."

You looked Shari in the eyes as she sat down next to you, you had a brief flash in your mind at you towering over her as a bug as she pleaded internally for you to change her back.

"I don't think that's what you would've done to me, maybe you would've wanted me to stop yelling at you," she continued your eyes were both locked together as neither of you blinked. She was in your head and you were giving her what she wanted to see. You watched as in the vision where you had powers her mouth vanished as her eyes went wide in fear. "That's what I thought, so I'm mouthless unable able to talk, is there anything else you might've done or would've you just gone to school and left me like that."

You were desperately trying to imagine you going to school but Shari forced the vision to what she might've done in your shoes as you made her clothes disappear. "Of course that's what you would've done, you are a pervert after all." The vision of you approached Shari with a lustful look as the mouthless version of her cowered from you. "I don't think you want me to see anymore of this." The vision faded and your eyes unlocked. Though being forced to imagine you lusting over Shari like that aroused you.

"I knew you were a pervert," she said looking at your crotch. It deflated as your dick appeared on the table. Shari paid no attention to the detached genitals and instead focused on your eyes again. "So what's the worst thing you've done?"

You saw yourself pulling down an adult Tiffany's panties at school and informing her, she was your girlfriend now. "This is the girl you've been having problems with isn't it, no wonder she hates you," Shari taunted. "Though if you had accepted the powers what would've you done?" You had a vision of you and Tiffany walking down the hall with her arm wrapped around yours, outwardly she was happy to be with you but her eyes were filled with sorrow and fear.

"So you would've used it to control people, yet you didn't take them," Shari was surprised and that hurt you a little, that's not who you wanted to be. "Now lets look at your other transgressions."

You saw yourself walking to the fridge, ready to leave for home, you opened the door and grabbed the chocolate bar from Shari's shelf. You knew this was wrong, but Shari was putting what she wanted to see into your mind. "A blatant thief," Shari accused. As you saw yourself taking things you didn't even touch, going back to even before you moved in. You figured it must've been Hannah stealing Shari's food but she was happy to blame you.

The visions changed without a word as you opened the door to the bathroom on several occasions when the girls were in there, either getting dressed or were in the shower, your memories showed you doing this on purpose. You also saw every time you left the toilet seat up or peed on the floor. Then you saw yourself doing something you didn't remember, you opened the door to Hannah's room while she was completely naked. You stood there admiring her for a moment before she noticed you and demanded you get out, while cursing your existence.

"What would've you done with Hannah, had you taken the powers?" Shari asked. In your mind, you imagined Hannah becoming a nudist and teasing you with her body, knowing you weren't going to do anything. "So Hannah thinks she's teasing you but you're actually enjoying it. You are a sicko," Shari states. "However, because you did not do these things I should show you leniency...." Shari pondered what she was going to do with you and decided to...
1552122.title: The entity gives Shari the power instead

15521221.content:
"I'm going to allow you to stay in the apartment," Shari stated as she stood up. "Though your appearance will reflect how I feel about you. Don't worry I promise not to squish you or anything. I can't say the same for Hannah though."

You felt a strange energy hit you as it reshaped your body, painfully. You shrunk into your clothes as you grew an extra pair of limbs. Your skin hardened as you grew an exoskeleton.

You found yourself in your underwear and scurried for the light, when you emerged you discovered Shari had turned you into a...
15521221.title: Turn you into a bug

155212211.content:
You crawled on the floor for a moment as you tried to adjust to your housefly body. Your mind seemed to be intact and you adjusted seeing through your compound eyes. Instincts seemed to take over as you flew up to the table and landed next to your dick.

Shari seemed to be moving slowly and when she talked it was loud, slow and distorted. She seemed to notice this and made adjustments. "Ha, this form suits you so much better. Now the only food of mine you'll be eating is what I put in the trash," she teased as she slapped her hand down next to you, showing she could end you at any moment. "I don't need to share a bed with Hannah anymore and you won't leave the toilet seat up. Of course you could still walk... or should I say fly on me naked but you'll just be a fly on the wall, so I'll let you have that one, especially since you don't have this," Shari picked up your dick. "I'm still not sure what I'm going to do with this but I'm sure I'll work something out. In the meantime I think we should celebrate this occasion with a little bit of fun."

You walked along the table, helpless to what Shari had planned. You now regretted not taking the powers when you had the chance.
155212211.title: Fly

1552122112.content:
"Where am I...?" Tiffany blinked. "How did I get here?" She looked around the apartment. "Who are you?" She asked Shari.

"I'm a friend of Marcus' cousin, he's been staying with us," Shari stated as she gestured to the chair with your clothes still on it. "Please take a seat."

"Marcus? That creep put you up to this?" Tiffany refused to budge as she looked around in confusion. "How did you even bring me here?"

"I'm a witch now, thanks to Marcus and no he didn't put me up to this. I hate that little pervert as much as you do, that's why you're here. I'm going have you play a little game," Shari gestured for her to sit once more. "See that fly on the table, that's Marcus."

Tiffany looked down at you with conflicting thoughts, she was happy to hear you were a fly but skeptical that what she had just been told was true. "Really?" she went to squash you but Shari stopped her.

"Not yet," Shari said one more time. "I said I want you to play a game. I don't want you to kill him outright."

"I'm listening," Tiffany finally brushed your clothes off the seat and sat down, before trapping you beneath her hands.

"Good," Shari joined her at the table. "Though you aren't going to like this game," Shari gave Tiffany a wicked grin before she...
1552122112.title: Tiffany appears in the room

choices: She turns Hannah into something that eats spiders.
15521221121.content:
You managed to get a brief look at Tiffany as she began to change, the first change was losing her hands and her arms turning into long and hairy sticks. She also grew six more eyes and fangs, then she shrunk out of your view. Shari moved up off the table and bent down, giving you a good view of her cleavage. She reached into Tiffany's clothes and grabbed a spider twice the size of you, placing it down next to your body.

"Now this is the game," Shari stated, freezing you both in place as she explained it. "If you want to be human again, Tiffany, you must trap and consume Marcus." She told Tiffany as she lent down on the table, to get as close to your eye levels as possible. "Marcus you just need to live longer than Tiffany or die of old age if you want to be human again."

Shari stood up again and resumed time. You quickly flew away before Tiffany could pounce at you, wondering how you were going to survive this long.

"Oh one more thing, if either of you leave the apartment, neither of you are getting changed back."

Shari smiled as she watched you two go on the move and wondered if she should do anything else to make this game more fun.
15521221121.title: Turned Tiffany into a spider

155212211211.content:
You flew as far away from the living area as possible, and entered Hannah's room. You'd be safe here for now but because the door was locked, Tiffany could set a trap if you decided to leave. You couldn't believe Shari's twisted mind to have you play this so called game which meant certain death for one of you but now you were playing it, you had to find a way to win.

Old age or getting Tiffany killed were the only options for you as Shari didn't explain the rules of starvation, your guess was that'd leave you dead and Tiffany stuck as a spider. Of course you could always leave and make that your fates anyway but it was better to aim to become human again.

Hannah was your only hope of survival, she didn't know what Shari had done so she'd see Tiffany as a random spider and you as a random fly. Of course the spider would be the thing she'd want dead the most but if you played things wrong, she might kill you and once again that would leave Tiffany stuck as she was.

You could also just give up and let Tiffany win, as you were mostly dead anyway and your plans came with risks that lead to death anyway. So sacrificing yourself would be the only way to ensure one of you became human again.

Still there were a couple of chances to ensure that you'd be the one that got their humanity restored so you were going to risk them. If you failed, Tiffany would at least still get to live.

In the end you decided on a plan that would get either of you restored no matter who lost. Though this meant one of you had to die. You would use yourself as bait to lure Tiffany into a location where Hannah would see her. Seeing both you and Tiffany would make Hannah prioritize killing Tiffany.
155212211211.title: She lets things play out.

1552123.content:
You refused the entity and your life continued as normal. Besides from the encounter in the morning, you repeat the day as before, you are late to school, need to do your exam at lunch, Amy breaks up with you and you know it has something to do with Tiffany. You get yelled at by Hannah for walking into her room and seeing her topless, even though she gave the room to you.

You end up being completely alone at school with no one to talk to, you failed your Biology exam and Hannah wants you to leave the apartment.

In the end you agree to move in with your parents early. It interrupts your schooling and end up needing to repeat your final year at a different school. Still with Tiffany out of your life, school give you no major drama.

You live out the rest of your life but always look back at that day and wonder if it was a dream and if not what would've changed if you said yes to gaining powers.
1552123.title: The End

info.brief_description: Someone in your life is a Witch.
info.description:
I created this item as I like witches as an antagonist for transformations, they can be cruel and uncaring or playful and mean spirited. I am someone with a lot of ideas and find many branching ideas in my head, which is why I created it as an interactive. Sometimes I have an idea of a different outcome though don't always know where it'll lead so I do encourage people to add to this story.

This story is about a young man finding out a woman in his life is a witch. This discovery leads to an interesting turn of events as he is subjected to all sorts of charms and transformations.

The witches in this story don't have unlimited power and aren't limited to women, so there might be a few warlocks running around. Their powers aren't unlimited as there's a power source that gives them their abilities, this can be multiple things, from a spell book to a magic gem or making a deal with a powerful entity, using these powers can come with draw backs however, like rapid aging or their soul being dammed. A witch can also share a power source with another witch, this too can come with draw backs.

The types of transformations seen in this story can be animals, inanimate objects, gender changes, body swaps, body modifications, age manipulation, petrification. Other spells such as time manipulation and enthrallment as well as anything else you'd expect from a witch is fine.

Rules
Death of any of the characters are fine, there's some nasty magic out there after all. Though that doesn't mean the story has to end, new victims can be discovered and some witches can reverse death with the right spells.

When dealing with characters under the age of 18, be mindful how you treat them, I will not tolerate any nudity or sex and these chapters will be deleted. I'd rather not have anyone under age but that does remove the ability for age regression and some times witches can be mean to children.

Be mindful of other people when writing, leaving as many options available as possible. If you can only add two paths I'd rather you do 'more options' as the second choice allowing for others to add their own ideas. On that note be careful how long you make your chapters, they shouldn't be too short however they should also leave room for choice. So don't write too many transformations or actions in a single chapter where another choice was available.

I am impulsive and do change my mind often so do except to see the occasional change in the structure of the interactive or some of my additions being edited. I will try not to delete chapters and if an idea I thought of gets taken I will use the more options or edit the choices so both out ideas for that choice can be expressed. (On that note, if anyone wanted to add to a particular option that was taken feel free to repeat that choice with your own idea).
